oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Bushmen anoint their heads with //hara (which is black and sparkling), mixed with fat, and rub their bodies with tto. (L VIII.-14. 7272 rev.,-7276 rev., note). Tto or 'Roode Klip' is dug out from the mountain side. Precautions to be taken against sorcerers upon these occasions. (L VIII.-14. 7275 and 7276, 7279 and 7380). hara tto. ||hara Tto
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ||hara Tto
